author: coffeebank
install_msg: Thanks for installing, I hope you enjoy :) To stay up to date with breaking changes, you might want to join my Support Discord. To find documentation, Discord, and more, drop by my site at https://coffeebank.github.io/coffee-cogs/hellohook/
name: hellohook
short: Create your own welcome bot with a custom profile picture!
description:
Create your own welcome bot with a custom profile picture! Set the welcome message to be regular text and/or an embed. Comes with usernames, user avatars, pings/mentions, server member counts, and leave messages.

Send invite-based welcome messsages, and assign custom roles when new members join with the invite!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
